ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] New song idea
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I like your song idea.  Verant would want control over the song for reasons you suggested.  I think the amount of control they would have to exert would
ygData.messageBody:
> I came up with a song that is the opposite of
> Melanie's Mellifluous Motion. A song that teleports
> all party members in the zone to the bards location.

I like your song idea. Verant would want control over
the song for reasons you suggested. I think the amount
of control they would have to exert would leave them
desiring this song less and less. They would probably
not allow it to work in the planes. And most likely
other areas would fall into the restricted access.

As far as new and valuable, that song is one of the best
I've seen so far. I suggest it goes on the list, and maybe
it will spark new ideas from Verant.

Harmonic.
